What I do?

As a Junior UX/UI Designer, I specialize in building intuitive websites and mobile apps that solve user problems.

Beyond the static screen, I am a video editor passionate about gaming content, creating short-form montages that emphasize rhythm, visual effects, and storytelling.

Skill and Tools

Designing:

I use Figma. From low-fidelity wireframes to polished high-fidelity UI, building organized design systems.

Editing:

I specialize in DaVinci Resolve. Fast-paced montages, precise cuts, flow, and visual storytelling.
